title: [FEA] [EPIC] Priority JSON Issues

labels.name: epic
labels.description: Issue that encompasses a significant feature or body of work

body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
We have a huge list of JSON issues in the [original epic](https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/9). This new epic is for tracking the higher priority issues that we want to focus on for now (24.02 and 24.04)
